DOC.brief_title: Adipose Tissue Polycystic Ovary Syndrome ( PCOS ) ( EIFFEL )
DOC.detailed_description: Epigenetics may represent new regulator mechanism explain gluteal vs. abdominal fat difference .
DOC.criteria: Female Age > 20 < 40 Weight stable ( change less 3 kg last 8 week ) BMI < 40 kg/m2 > 27 kg/m2 Supplemental inclusion criterion PCOS woman : NIH criterion confirm subject ' medical record . Male Women pregnant lactating ( breast feeding ) Postmenopausal woman Women hysterectomy Diagnosed diabetes , fast blood sugar > 126 mg/dL . Untreated symptomatic thyroid disease . Impaired kidney liver function , evidence blood work Hypertension/ high blood pressure take blood pressure medication Use oral contraceptive hormone replacement therapy . History drug alcohol abuse ( > 3 drink per day ) last 5 year , psychiatric disease prohibit adherence study protocol . History cancer within last 5 year . History organ transplant . History HIV , active Hepatitis B C , Tuberculosis . History heart attack/ myocardial infarction . Presence clinically significant abnormality EKG . Current smoker ( smoke within past 3 month ) Use medication know influence glucose , fat and/or energy metabolism within last 3 month ( e.g. , growth hormone therapy , glucocorticoid [ steroid ] , etc. ) . Metformin woman PCOS allow .
